headline.main: TAYLOR GIVES POPE FLORENTINE VILLA; Gift as Educational Site Is Announced as American Ends Long Farewell Audience ENVOY'S WIFE IS RECEIVED Couple Leave Today for Lisbon En Route Home -- Return Is Held Problematical

lead_paragraph: ROME, Sept. 21 -- His mission completed, Myron C. Taylor, President Roosevelt's personal envoy to the Vatican, this morning tool leave of Pope Pius XII in a private audience which lasted fifty minutes. He and Mrs. Taylor will leave early tomorrow by plane for Lisbon.
snippet: ROME, Sept. 21 -- His mission completed, Myron C. Taylor, President Roosevelt's personal envoy to the Vatican, this morning tool leave of Pope Pius XII in a private audience which lasted fifty minutes. He and Mrs. Taylor will leave early tomorrow ...

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
